name: microservices
description: Example Nestjs microservices with different transports(GRPC, Kafka, Rabbit, NATS)

scripts.install:unix: for dir in */; do if [ -e \"$dir/package.json\" ]; then echo \"Installing in $dir\" && cd \"$dir\" && npm install && npx prisma generate && cd ..; fi; done
scripts.install:win: PowerShell -Command "Get-ChildItem -Directory | ForEach-Object { if (Test-Path $_\package.json) { Write-Output 'Installing in ' $_.FullName; Set-Location $_; npm install; npx prisma generate; Set-Location .. } }"
